desc: Cottage Fresh Scents, a range of bath and body products as well as soy (natural/vegetable) wax melts. All handmade in the UK. Cruelty free and use environmentally friendly packaging where possible.

layout.text:
Our range of soy wax melts and reed diffusers will make your home smell amazing with a whole range of different aromas to suit all tastes.
Bath and body products are now available. Soak in luxurious bubbles from the solid bubble bath rolls and crumble. Wash and shave with the whipped soap for silky smooth skin. Rub on the body butter to nourish your skin. Bath bombs are coming soon!
